definition.procedurexml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="velocityMultiplier">velocityMultiplier</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="148" y="37"><field name="trigger">entity_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_vel_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:velocityMultiplier</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">this number should be the height where gravity begins decreasing</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">controls how gradually gravity decreases over distance.
higher = more gradual</comment></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">dividing by 100 turns the result into a percentage to multiply the current velocity by</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:velocityMultiplier</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:velocityMultiplier</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="entity_set_movement"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="vx"><block type="entity_vel_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="vy"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_vel_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:velocityMultiplier</field></block></value></block></value><value name="vz"><block type="entity_vel_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
